metadata.title: Are There Application Notes for Water Level Detection?

sections.content:
Question:
Are there application notes for water level detection?
Answer:
Yes, we have it ready.
Refer to the Capacitance Sensor Application Reference Design page.
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/application/home-building/capacitive-touch-solutions/capacitive-sensor-application-reference-design-waterlevel-measurement-reference-design
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
